akn:content.akn:p: Except as provided in ยง 3-1207.54 and subsection (d) of this section, a person shall not engage in practice as a pharmacy technician in the District unless the person holds a valid registration issued by the Board and practices under the direct supervision of a person licensed to practice pharmacy under this chapter.
To be eligible for registration as a pharmacy technician, a person shall provide proof acceptable to the Board that he or she has:

Notwithstanding subsection (b) of this section, for a period of one year after the effective date of rules issued pursuant to ยง 3-1207.58, a person who does not meet the requirements for registration under subsection (b) of this section shall be eligible for registration as a pharmacy technician if:

Notwithstanding subsection (a) of this section, for a period of one year after the effective date of the rules issued pursuant to ยง 3-1207.58, a person who is not eligible for registration under subsection (b) or (c) of this section may engage in practice as a pharmacy technician if the person:
